Ingredients: Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbadensis Leaf) Powder, Bentonite Clay, Green Tea Powder, Kelp Powder, Maltodextrin, Red Sandalwood Powder

Directions: 1 tsp mask + 1 tsp water 
Mix and Apply 
(skin may warm as it cleans)
Remove after 15 mins/dry 5 masks per packet
